title: Riding the AI wave: 3 stocks poised to gain from the power boom

content:

But there’s one piece of the puzzle that often gets less attention: Power.

title: Arm launches new generation of mobile chip designs geared for AI
description: Arm Holdings said on Tuesday it was launching its next-generation set of chip designs called Lumex that it has optimized for artificial intelligence to run on mobile devices such as smartphones and watches without accessing the internet.

title: Wall Street indexes notch record high closes, investors bet rate cut
description: Wall Street's major indexes achieved record closing highs, propelled by UnitedHealth's strong performance and revised payroll data fueling expectations of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts. Optimism surrounding artificial intelligence and anticipated lower borrowing costs continued to drive the market rally. However, Apple shares declined after the unveiling of new iPhones failed to impress investors.

title: PwC launches gen AI 'colleague' for tax functions
description: MUMBAI, Sep 9 : PwC India on Tuesday introduced a generative artificial intelligence platform to help clients with tax and regulatory functions. Billed as ‘GenAI colleague’ for tax function, the platform christened ‘Navigate Tax Hub’ leverages advanced AI, PwC’s tax expertise, and secure document integration to drive efficiency, accuracy, and value for tax teams, according to a statement. It is aimed at driving efficiencies in the tax function and also helps the tax teams become much more effective and value-adding […]

title: The Debate On Whether Artificial General Intelligence Should Inevitably Be Declared A Worldwide Public Good With Free Access For All
description: When AI reaches AGI (artificial general intelligence), should everyone have free access? If not, we will be AGI haves and AGI have-nots. Here's the inside scoop.
